DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to examine the effect of benzydamine hydrochloride to postoperative sore throat in pediatric patients. We will spray benzydmaine hydrochloride or normal saline at oral cavity and the tip of endotracheal tube, than compare the prevalence of postoperative sore throat using smartphone application in pediatric patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Benzydamine Hydrochloride to Postoperative Sore Throat in Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 1. postoperative sore throat incidence (over 2) 1; no, 2;mild, 3;moderate, 4;severe 2. scoring of pain with smartphone application (kids pain scale) 3. incidence of use of rescue pain killer
DOC.criteria: general anesthesia intubation require recent upper airway infection could not express the pain
